description: A template to create and deploy your ruboty on slack.

GOOGLE_REFRESH_TOKEN.description: Refresh token issued with access token

SLACK_PASSWORD.description: The password of your ruboty's slack account.

SLACK_ROOM.description: Comma-separated room names your ruboty first joins in.

SLACK_TEAM.description: The name of your slack team.

SLACK_USERNAME.description: The username of your ruboty's slack account.

name: Ruboty Timecard
